This is for informational purposes only and contains no tax results.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="returnGeneratedLineItemsIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If this indicator is set, the response message returns child line items that were generated by the Tax Assist allocation feature. Otherwise, these line items are deleted after the transaction is written to the Tax Journal and only the primary line item, which contains the combined tax results of the child line items, is passed back to the host system.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="deliveryTerm" type="DeliveryTermCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that determines the vendor or customer jurisdiction in which the title transfer of a supply takes place. This is also known as Shipping Terms. Delivery Terms information could be critical to determine the place of supply, for example, in distance selling.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentDate" type="xsd:date" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The actual date of the requested action. The calculation engine uses this date to determine the valid tax rates and rules.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the document and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. The Transaction ID is used for synchronization services, but is not used for reporting purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionType" type="ProcurementTransactionType" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier for the specific transaction type to be used by the transaction and/or line item. If transactionType is not set at the line item level, the line item uses the transaction level value.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="simplificationCode" type="SimplificationCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A code that indicates a special action on the transaction being processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="recoverableDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date used to calculate Recoverable Input VAT.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="postToJournal" type="xsd:boolean" default="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the results of the transaction are written to the Tax Journal. Defaults to true.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="roundAtLineLevel" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the Calculation Engine performs rounding at the Line Item Level. Default value is False.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="paymentDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date the purchaser paid for the product. If the purchaser pays for the product but physically receives it at a later date, Vertex O Series uses this field for returns and reporting for your tax type. This field is also used in cash accounting.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentSequenceId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Supports reporting and the document sequence identifier used by your ERP system. Some countries require that documents follow a unique sequential sequence number, depending on the registration type and the type of invoice. Use this field for audit purposes to track the sequence of your documents. This field is used in European Union (EU) countries.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="60"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:attributeGroup> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Purchase Order transaction composite messages. Declaration of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="LineItemPOTIType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Line Item declaration for Purchase Order Request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Buyer" type="BuyerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The buyer for the transaction. The buyer is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Vendor" type="VendorType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The vendor for the transaction. The vendor is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Purchase" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CommodityCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Quantity" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Weight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Volume" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SupplementaryUnit" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="StatisticalValue" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Freight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="UnitPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ExtendedPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="LandedCost" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AmountBilledToDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="FlexibleFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ReturnsFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemPOTIType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A sub-component (or child line item) of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="PurchaseOrderLineItemGroup"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LineItemPOTOType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Line Item declaration for Purchase Order Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Buyer" type="BuyerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The buyer for the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Vendor" type="VendorType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The vendor for the transaction. The vendor is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Purchase" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CommodityCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Quantity" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Weight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Volume" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SupplementaryUnit" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="StatisticalValue" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Freight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="UnitPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ExtendedPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AmountBilledToDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Taxes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="TotalTax" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="FlexibleFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ReturnsFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AssistedParameters" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemPOTOType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A sub-component (or child line item) of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="PurchaseOrderLineItemGroup"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PurchaseOrderRequestType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request used to estimate the sales tax on intended purchases made by a Buyer. The intended purchase of goods or services including tax is used as input to generate the purchase order. The ultimate use of the goods or services typically dictates the taxability of the purchase. Note that because these events are used to estimate tax, no transactions are stored in the Tax Journal.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxTransactionRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Currency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="OriginalCurrency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Buyer" type="BuyerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The buyer for the transaction. The buyer is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Vendor" type="VendorType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The vendor for the transaction. The vendor is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemPOTIType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The header for a component of a transaction. A line item is required for each component of the transaction. Each transaction requires at least one line item. Note that a line item can contain child line items.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="PurchaseOrderTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PurchaseOrderResponseType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Purchase Order Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxTransactionResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Currency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="OriginalCurrency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Buyer" type="BuyerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The buyer for the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Vendor" type="VendorType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The vendor for the transaction. The vendor is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SubTotal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Total" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TotalTax" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemPOTOType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The header for a component of a transaction. Note that a line item can contain child line items.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="PurchaseOrderTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:attributeGroup name="PurchaseOrderLineItemGroup"> <xsd:attribute name="lineItemNumber" type="xsd:integer" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A line number for the line item. This number can be used as a reference in reports or in audits. If no line item number is supplied, a number will be assigned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="taxDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date on which the line item record was produced. This can also be represented as a PO line item date, a lease line item date, and so on. Defaults to the documentDate of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="isMulticomponent" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the calculation engine calculates component-level max tax, where applicable. type of vehicle that transported the product across the country border. For a list of acceptable values, see the filing instructions for each country where you file an Intrastat report.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:maxInclusive value="99"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="natureOfTransaction" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A code that indicates the type of transaction being declared for Intrastat purposes. For a list of acceptable values, see the filing instructions for each country where you file an Intrastat report.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:minInclusive value="1"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="intrastatCommodityCode" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used to classify the goods and services. For a list of acceptable values, see the filing instructions for each country where you file an Intrastat report.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{1,8}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="netMassKilograms" type="xsd:integer" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The mass of the product in kilograms.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="lineItemId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the line item and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. This parameter is needed to perform synchronization services, but it is not used for reporting purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="taxIncludedIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether tax is included in the Extended Price.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionType" type="ProcurementTransactionType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier for the specific transaction type to be used by the transaction and/or line item. If transactionType is not set at the line item level, the line item uses the transaction level value.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="simplificationCode" type="SimplificationCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A code that indicates a special action on the transaction being processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="recoverableDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date used to calculate Recoverable Input VAT.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="blockingOverridePercent" type="PercentType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The recoverable override percentage of the blocking override for the line item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="partialExemptRecoverableOverridePercent" type="PercentType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The recoverable override percentage of a partial exemption on the line item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="titleTransfer" type="PointOfTitleTransferCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A contractual term indicating where the title to goods actually changes hands from seller to buyer. This indicator is evaluated to determine the situs (or place of supply) for the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="chainTransactionPhase" type="ChainTransactionPhaseCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies a phase within a series of transactions in which multiple invoices are raised with only a single movement of goods.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="exportProcedure" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The export procedure (sales) or import procedure (purchases) that is applied for INTRASTAT purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:attributeGroup> <xsd:attributeGroup name="PurchaseOrderTransactionGroup"> <xsd:attribute name="documentNumber" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The document number in the host application that references the event.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of business document for the transaction. This field is on the transaction level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="billingType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of bill, such as invoice, credit or debit memo, or cancellation document. This field influences how the Calculation Engine processes the bill. This field is on the transaction level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="orderType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The purpose of the order. This field influences how the Calculation Engine processes the order. This field is on the transaction level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="postingDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date when the transaction is posted for auditing and reporting purposes. If no date is provided, the Calculation Engine uses the date when the transaction was processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="locationCode" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A value that can be used for tax return filing in jurisdictions that require taxes to be filed for individual retail locations.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="returnAssistedParametersIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the response message should contain an additional structure that shows the elements/attributes that were changed by Tax Assist. This is for informational purposes only and contains no tax results.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="returnGeneratedLineItemsIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If this indicator is set, the response message returns child line items that were generated by the Tax Assist allocation feature. Otherwise, these line items are deleted after the transaction is written to the Tax Journal and only the primary line item, which contains the combined tax results of the child line items, is passed back to the host system.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="deliveryTerm" type="DeliveryTermCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that determines the vendor or customer jurisdiction in which the title transfer of a supply takes place. This is also known as Shipping Terms. Delivery Terms information could be critical to determine the place of supply, for example, in distance selling.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentDate" type="xsd:date" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The actual date of the requested action. The calculation engine uses this date to determine the valid tax rates and rules.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the document and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. The Transaction ID is used for synchronization services, but is not used for reporting purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionType" type="ProcurementTransactionType" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier for the specific transaction type to be used by the transaction and/or line item. If transactionType is not set at the line item level, the line item uses the transaction level value.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="simplificationCode" type="SimplificationCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A code that indicates a special action on the transaction being processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="recoverableDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date used to calculate Recoverable Input VAT.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="calculateVendorTaxIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>When set to TRUE, causes the vendor-charged liability to be processed when determining the buyer's self-accrual liability.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="roundAtLineLevel" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the Calculation Engine performs rounding at the Line Item Level. Default value is False.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="paymentDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date the purchaser paid for the product. If the purchaser pays for the product but physically receives it at a later date, Vertex O Series uses this field for returns and reporting for your tax type. This field is also used in cash accounting.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentSequenceId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Supports reporting and the document sequence identifier used by your ERP system. Some countries require that documents follow a unique sequential sequence number, depending on the registration type and the type of invoice. Use this field for audit purposes to track the sequence of your documents. This field is used in European Union (EU) countries.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="60"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:attributeGroup> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Quotation transaction composite messages. Declaration of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="LineItemQSIType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Line Item declaration for Quotation Request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Seller" type="SellerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The seller for the transaction. The seller is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Customer" type="CustomerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer for the transaction. The customer is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Product" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CommodityCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Quantity" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Weight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Volume" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SupplementaryUnit" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="StatisticalValue" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Freight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="FairMarketValue" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Cost" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="UnitPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ExtendedPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="LandedCost" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Discount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AmountBilledToDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="FlexibleFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ReturnsFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemQSIType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A sub-component (or child line item) of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="QuotationLineItemGroup"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LineItemQSOType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Line Item declaration for Quotation Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Seller" type="SellerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The seller for the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Customer" type="CustomerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer for the transaction. The customer is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Product" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CommodityCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Quantity" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Weight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Volume" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SupplementaryUnit" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="StatisticalValue" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Freight" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="FairMarketValue" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="UnitPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ExtendedPrice" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Discount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AmountBilledToDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Taxes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="TotalTax" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="FlexibleFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ReturnsFields" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AssistedParameters" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemQSOType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A sub-component (or child line item) of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="QuotationLineItemGroup"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QuotationRequestType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request used to estimate taxes on the proposed sale, rental, or lease of goods or services by the Seller. Quotations may be called from a CRM, Mobile Sale, Order Entry, or Internet Sale application. Because Quotation transactions are subject to change until an invoice is finalized, they are not written to the Tax Journal.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxTransactionRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Currency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="OriginalCurrency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Seller" type="SellerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The seller for the transaction. The seller is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Customer" type="CustomerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer for the transaction. The customer is described by the child elements and attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Discount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemQSIType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The header for a component of a transaction. A line item is required for each component of the transaction. Each transaction requires at least one line item. Note that a line item can contain child line items.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="QuotationTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QuotationResponseType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Quotation Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxTransactionResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Currency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="OriginalCurrency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Seller" type="SellerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The seller for the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Customer" type="CustomerType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer for the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="TaxOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ImpositionToProcess" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="JurisdictionOverride" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="SitusOverride" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Discount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SubTotal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Total" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TotalTax" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LineItem" type="LineItemQSOType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The header for a component of a transaction. A line item is required for each component of the transaction. Each transaction requires at least one line item. Note that a line item can contain child line items.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="QuotationTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:attributeGroup name="QuotationLineItemGroup"> <xsd:attribute name="lineItemNumber" type="xsd:integer" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A line number for the line item. This number can be used as a reference in reports or in audits. If no line item number is supplied, a number will be assigned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="taxDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date on which the line item record was produced. This can also be represented as a PO line item date, a lease line item date, and so on. Defaults to the documentDate of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="isMulticomponent" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the calculation engine calculates component-level max tax, where applicable. Amounts at the child level of the multi-component item are used for tax calculation. Amounts at the parent level are ignored. Set this attribute to true for line items at the parent level only. Line items at the child level remain false. Defaults to false.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="locationCode" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A value that can be used for tax return filing in jurisdictions that require taxes to be filed for individual retail locations.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="deliveryTerm" type="DeliveryTermCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that determines the vendor or customer jurisdiction in which the title transfer of a supply takes place. This is also known as Shipping Terms. Delivery Terms information could be critical to determine the place of supply, for example, in distance selling.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="postingDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date when the transaction is posted for auditing and reporting purposes. If no date is provided, the Calculation Engine uses the date when the transaction was processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="costCenter" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A value that indicates a specific area of an organization generally related to functional or accounting areas.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="departmentCode" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique identifier that associates a line item to a department for purchasing purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="generalLedgerAccount" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A value that is used with company's Chart of Accounts.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="materialCode" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A value that represents a specific item or product.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="projectNumber" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique identifier that associates a line item to a project for purchasing purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="usage" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Directly identifies a usage by user-defined usage code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="usageClass" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Directly identifies a usage class by user-defined usage class code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> This field is on the transaction level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="orderType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The purpose of the order. This field influences how the Calculation Engine processes the order. This field is on the transaction level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="postingDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date when the transaction is posted for auditing and reporting purposes. If no date is provided, the Calculation Engine uses the date when the transaction was processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="locationCode" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A value that can be used for tax return filing in jurisdictions that require taxes to be filed for individual retail locations.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="returnAssistedParametersIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the response message should contain an additional structure that shows the elements/attributes that were changed by Tax Assist. This is for informational purposes only and contains no tax results.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="returnGeneratedLineItemsIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If this indicator is set, the response message returns child line items that were generated by the Tax Assist allocation feature. Otherwise, these line items are deleted after the transaction is written to the Tax Journal and only the primary line item, which contains the combined tax results of the child line items, is passed back to the host system.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="deliveryTerm" type="DeliveryTermCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that determines the vendor or customer jurisdiction in which the title transfer of a supply takes place. This is also known as Shipping Terms. Delivery Terms information could be critical to determine the place of supply, for example, in distance selling.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentDate" type="xsd:date" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The actual date of the requested action. The calculation engine uses this date to determine the valid tax rates and rules.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the document and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. The Transaction ID is used for synchronization services, but is not used for reporting purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionType" type="SaleTransactionType" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier for the specific transaction type to be used by the transaction and/or line item. If transactionType is not set at the line item level, the line item uses the transaction level value.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="simplificationCode" type="SimplificationCodeType" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A code that indicates a special action on the transaction being processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="roundAtLineLevel" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether the Calculation Engine performs rounding at the Line Item Level. Default value is False.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="paymentDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date the purchaser paid for the product. If the purchaser pays for the product but physically receives it at a later date, Vertex O Series uses this field for returns and reporting for your tax type. This field is also used in cash accounting.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentSequenceId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Supports reporting and the document sequence identifier used by your ERP system. Some countries require that documents follow a unique sequential sequence number, depending on the registration type and the type of invoice. Use this field for audit purposes to track the sequence of your documents. This field is used in European Union (EU) countries.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="0"/> <xsd:maxLength value="60"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:attributeGroup> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2008-2009 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="ReversalRequestType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reversal Request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxSynchronizationRequestType"> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="ReversalTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ReversalResponseType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reversal Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxSynchronizationResponseType"> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="ReversalTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:attributeGroup name="ReversalTransactionGroup"> <xsd:attribute name="originalTransactionId" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Transaction ID of the transaction to be reversed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the document and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. The Transaction ID is used for synchronization services, but is not used for reporting purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="postingDate" type="xsd:date" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date when the transaction is posted for auditing and reporting purposes. If no date is provided, the Calculation Engine uses the date when the transaction was processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="documentNumber" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The document number in the host application that references the event.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:attributeGroup> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Rollback transaction composite messages. Declaration of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="RollbackRequestType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Rollback Request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxSynchronizationRequestType"> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="RollbackTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RollbackResponseType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Rollback Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxSynchronizationResponseType"> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="RollbackTransactionGroup"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:attributeGroup name="RollbackTransactionGroup"> <xsd:attribute name="transactionId" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the document and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. The Transaction ID is used for synchronization services, but is not used for reporting purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:attributeGroup> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2009 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>TransactionExists transaction composite messages. Declaration of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="TransactionExistsRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction Exists Request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxSynchronizationRequestType"> <xsd:attribute name="transactionId" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the document and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. The Transaction ID is used for synchronization services, but is not used for reporting purposes. Stored in the Tax Journal as transSyncIdCode.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TransactionExistsResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction Exists Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxSynchronizationResponseType"> <xsd:attribute name="transactionId" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier that further defines the document and corresponds to the transaction stored in the host system. The Transaction ID is used for synchronization services, but is not used for reporting purposes. Stored in the Tax Journal as transSyncIdCode.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="transactionExistsIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not a transaction with the specified transactionId exists in the Tax Journal. Note: Transactions flagged as Deleted are considered to NOT exist in the Tax Journal.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area lookup composite messages. Declararion of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="FindChangedTaxAreaIdsRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DatePeriod"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date range to be searched.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="DatePeriodType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BeginDate" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The start date of the range to be searched.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EndDate" type="xsd:date" default="9999-12-31" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The end date of the range to be searched. Defaults to 9999-12-31.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area lookup composite messages. Declararion of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="FindChangedTaxAreaIdsResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of tax areas changed during an identified period of time.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TaxAreaId" type="TaxAreaIdType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A Vertex-specific number that identifies a tax area.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Check whether Tax Area changed during a specific time period composite messages. Declararion of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="IsTaxAreaChangedRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicator whether a tax area has changed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DatePeriod"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date range to be searched.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="DatePeriodType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BeginDate" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The start date of the range to be searched.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EndDate" type="xsd:date" default="9999-12-31" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The end date of the range to be searched. Defaults to 9999-12-31.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TaxAreaId" type="TaxAreaIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A Vertex-specific number that identifies a tax area.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Check whether Tax Area changed during a specific time period composite messages. Declararion of structure and data types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="IsTaxAreaChangedResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Result of a tax area changes query.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IsChanged" type="xsd:boolean" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flag indicating whether the tax area id has changed during the specified period of time.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2009 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area Request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="FindTaxAreasRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TaxAreaLookup" type="TaxAreaLookupType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The criteria to use in looking up the tax area. Use one of the following: TaxAreaId, PostalAddress, or ExternalJurisdiction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2009 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="FindTaxAreasResponseType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area Response type structure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent mixed="false"> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TaxAreaLookupResult" type="TaxAreaLookupResultType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The results returned from the tax area lookup.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TaxAreaLookupResultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TaxAreaResult" type="TaxAreaResultType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The tax jurisdiction identified by the lookup.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="LookupException" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If present, information about the exception that occurred for the lookup.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ExceptionType" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of lookup exception encountered.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RootCause" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The cause of the exception.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="lookupId" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Internal identifier for this lookup.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area Request message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="TaxAreaRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area request type declaration.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TaxAreaLookup" type="TaxAreaLookupType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The criteria to use in looking up the tax area. Use one of the following: TaxAreaId, PostalAddress, or ExternalJurisdiction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Core.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../tax/VertexInc-Common.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area Response message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="TaxAreaResponseType" mixed="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Tax Area Response type structure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="TaxgisResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TaxAreaResult" type="TaxAreaResultType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A set of one or more geographic areas that correspond to a unique combination of tax jurisdictions where the tax area's boundaries are derived from the overlay of the geographic areas that form the domain of those jurisdictions.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="7.0" xml:lang="en-us" xmlns="urn:vertexinc:o-series:tps:7:0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Copyright Vertex Inc. 2007-2012 All Rights Reserved</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType name="VersionRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Request for version information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="VersionResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Result of a version lookup</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ProductVersions" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Versions of the various Vertex software products.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ProductVersion" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version identifier for the Vertex software product.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="productName" type="xsd:string" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Title of the named product.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="LibraryVersions" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Versions of the named software library.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="LibraryVersion" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version identifier for the named softwre library.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="libraryName" type="xsd:string" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the named library.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="libraryOwner" type="xsd:string" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Owner of the named library.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DatabaseVersions" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Versions of the various databases.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DatabaseVersion" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version identifier for the named database.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SchemaVersion"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version identifier for each database subject area.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PlatformVersion"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version identifier for the database platform.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="vendorName" type="xsd:string" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Vendor name for the TPS databases.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DriverVersion"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version identifier for the database driver.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="driverName" type="xsd:string" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the database drvier.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DataContentVersions" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Versions of the various data contents</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataContentVersion" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version identifier for the data content.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="contentName" type="xsd:string" use="optional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the data content.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element>
